column5: Offer up the [Color of Sea] and inspect me.
Offer up the [Color of Sea] and inspect me.
Offer up four different colors, and inspect me.
Offer up four different colors, and inspect me.
Offer the [Color of Flame], [Color of Trees]
The darkness is close to the trees and ocean.
The tree is above the fire, the sea is to the
right of the flame. You must present all three.
Offer the [Color of Flame] and [Color of Trees]
The darkness is close to the trees and ocean,
The trees are above the fire, the sea is to the right of the flame.
